name: SFVoiceAnalytics
desc: A collection of vocal analysis metrics.

items.name: class SFAcousticFeature
items.desc: The value of a voice analysis metric.

items.name: var voicing: SFAcousticFeature
items.desc: The likelihood of a voice in each frame of a transcription segment, expressed as a probability in the range [0.0, 1.0].

items.name: var pitch: SFAcousticFeature
items.desc: The highness or lowness of the tone (fundamental frequency) in each frame of a transcription segment, expressed as a logarithm.

items.name: var jitter: SFAcousticFeature
items.desc: The variation in pitch in each frame of a transcription segment, expressed as a percentage of the frameâ€™s fundamental frequency.

items.name: var shimmer: SFAcousticFeature
items.desc: The variation in vocal volume stability (amplitude) in each frame of a transcription segment, expressed in decibels.
